name: Bee Nice: Daily Challenges to Improve Yourself and the People Around You. The Random Acts of Kindness Game
name_original: Bee Nice: Daily Challenges to Improve Yourself and the People Around You. The Random Acts of Kindness Game
description:
Increase your happiness and those around you with simple yet fun and friendly daily challenges of random acts of kindness.

Everyday you will be welcomed with a new challenges to complete each day. These fun tasks can be as simple as giving a stranger a smile or learning a new joke. Each challenge was created to directly make your life or someone else's life a little happier.

New challenges appear all the time with Bee Nice's unique notification challenge system that sends out new tasks depending on the day, holiday, or time. You see a notification when a certain challenge's timing is just right in order to the make the biggest impact for you and your community.

Make you and the world around you a little better place by playing Bee Nice today!

View a quick video of the app in action on youtube; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=As9twhTUofU
